text: Bettina Stark-Watzinger (; Stark,Susanne Höll (September 15, 2017), Wer will hier rein? Süddeutsche Zeitung. born 12 May 1968) is a German economist and politician of the Free Democratic Party (FDP) who has been serving as Minister of Education and Research in Chancellor Olaf Scholz's cabinet since 2021. She has been a member of the Bundestag from the state of Hesse since 2017. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Education ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Free Democratic Party of Germany Category:German economists Category:German academics Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Politicians from Frankfurt Category:Writers from Frankfurt
title: Bettina Stark-Watzinger
